answers.answer: Hi there and welcome.  Well, there are actually reasons why urine would smell like that.  First, you'd want to rule out any food items causing it.  High protein diets can do that.  Second, look into dehydration.  Getting close to menopause, this can happen to some women.  Look into diabetes and sexually transmitted diseases.so, basically, make sure something simple in the diet isn't causing it, increase liquid intake and if it persists, a doctor should check someone out.good luck

question: my question is simply.. what the heck would make you smell like ammonia.. like a real strong smell of ammonia ..please help
title: what's up with that
